VEC.Q: How many ring layers are in this sunburst chart?
How many segments are in this sunburst chart?
How many segments are in the innermost ring of this sunburst chart?
VEC.A: There are {3} segments in the innermost ring.

VEC.Q: How many segments are in the outermost ring of this sunburst chart?
VEC.A: There are {4} segments in the outermost ring.

SRP.Q: Is Sports Technology positioned outside, inside or on the same side as Performance Analysis?
SRP.A: Sports Technology is positioned {inside} Performance Analysis.

VPR.Q: Which top-level category has the highest proportion in this sunburst chart?
VPR.A: The top-level category with the highest proportion is {Fitness and Wellness}.

NF.Q: Which categories in the segment Fitness and Wellness exceed 50%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.
Which categories in the segment Fitness and Wellness are below 50%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.

NC.Q: Which has the largest value: Fitness and Wellness, Competitive Sports, Individual Sports, or Outdoor Activities?
NC.A: The value of {Fitness and Wellness} is the largest.

NC.Q: Which is smaller, the value of Competitive Sports, Individual Sports, or Sports Media and Tech?
NC.A: The value of {Sports Media and Tech} is smaller.

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
MSR.A: The path that contributes the most to the total is: {Fitness and Wellness to Outdoor Activities to Running Clubs to City Runs}.
